Test Name: Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) with Reflex, Plasma
Purpose: To measure TSH levels in plasma and automatically perform Free T4 testing when TSH is outside the normal range, aiding thyroid function assessment.
Container: Vacutainer tube with EDTA or lithium heparin
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas e411)
